item.title: Tony Tempo - Radio Stream 12-14-2011
item.description:
Yes massive and crew, Tony Tempo is back with a vengeance.
Brand New Music

4 Radio Stations One Night at the SAME time.
On A Wednesday  @ 8 - 11pm est.

http://www.islandmix.com/static - Static Radio (NY)
http://www.dqwayzay.com - QZRadio (NY)
http://www.maddflava.com Madd Flava Radio (Atl)
http://www.spinDmusic.com (Sydney, Australia)

So the ride continues!!!!

 

Happy Holidays to all families.
item.dc:creator: DJ Tony Tempo

item.title: Tony Tempo - Bacchanal Radio 04-27-2011 - 4 Hour Session
item.description:
Greetings,

This 4 hour session starts off like this:

Dance Music (Soca Style) Session - 0:00 to 27:05
Soca Chutney w/Rum Session - 27:05 to 48:55
Soca Groovy Session - 48:55 to 1:28:12
Bacchanal Session - 1:28:12 to 2:24:51
Cool Down Soca Session - 2:24:51 to 2:34:41
Reggae Session - 2:34:41 to 3:05:26
Love Song Memories Session  - 3:05:26 to 3:51:08

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget Atlanta Carnival weekend
Thursday - Flag Party - Club ESSO
Friday - Jouvert - Club Atrium
Saturday - Soca Explosion - Club Atrium
Sunday -  Wear White - Golden Glide (See Flyer Below)

 

Enjoy

DJ Tony Tempo

6 Times International Soca DJ of the Year Nominee
Bookings - 404-429-5400

ShadyVille Caribbean Member - http://www.shadyvillecaribbean.com

Podcasts - http://djtonytempo.podomatic.com | iTunes - http://bit.ly/goNxeJ 
Bacchanal Radio - http://www.BacchanalRadio.com Wednesday's 9 - 12pm EST

My profiles:  Facebook  Twitter

item.title: Tony Tempo - Ash Wednesday on Bacchanal Radio 3-09-2011
item.description:
This is the ASH Wednesday Bacchanal Show.  

Trinidad & Tobago carnival maybe done, but not here.  This starts off with PACE!  

So Watch d Ride and get ready for the Maddddddnessssss!  Also, check the end!  Booom!

Your not going to hear the regular tracks here.  Remix after Roadmix after Remix.

-----------------------

Some Events to Look Out For with Tony Tempo

April 2nd - Washington DC
Memorial Day Weekend - Atlanta Carnival
June - Germany Carnival
July 29th - Bermuda 

------------------------

DJ Tony Tempo
6 Times International Soca DJ of the Year Nominee


Bookings - 404-429-5400

ShadyVille Caribbean Member - http://www.shadyvillecaribbean.com

Podcasts - http://djtonytempo.podomatic.com | iTunes - http://bit.ly/goNxeJ 
Bacchanal Radio - http://www.BacchanalRadio.com Wednesday's 9 - 12pm EST

item.description:

Perfect for those who remember those days and for those who like the old school vibe.
Made for your CD. So download and burn it and ERUPT it in your car.

item.title: DJ TONY TEMPO JOINS ELITE LINE-UP FOR SHADYVILLE CARIBBEAN
item.description: Award-winner is First Soca DJ to Link-up with the Shadyville Endeavor ATLANTA, Sept 17, 2009 – International sensation DJ Tony Tempo is the first Soca deejay to join the celebrated roster of mix masters for Shadyville Caribbean. Shadyville Caribbean, an extension of DJ Whoo Kid’s international Shadyville DJ fraternity, promotes the integration of music from the region with music in mainstream markets is a As one of the world’s most recognized Soca music ambassadors, DJ Tony Tempo will bring his Soca mixes to expand the entertainment options offered by Shadyville Caribbean. “This is a prime opportunity to share Soca music with a much wider audience around the world, while enticing new listeners to experience the hottest sounds and waist-whining riddims from the Caribbean,” said DJ Tony Tempo. Long-time Soca music lovers and those newly interested in this musical genre can download fresh and exclusive mixes from DJ Tony Tempo on ShadyvilleCaribbean.com. Fans can also check out the events page for parties, carnivals and other Shadyville programs featuring DJ Tony Tempo. Shadyville Caribbean is a venture supported by G-Unit and Thisis50. Contact: DJ Tony Tempo 404 429-5400 djtonytempo@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: DJ Tony Tempo
item.itunes:summary:
Award-winner is First Soca DJ to Link-up with the Shadyville Endeavor
ATLANTA, Sept 17, 2009 – International sensation DJ Tony Tempo is the first Soca deejay to join the celebrated roster of mix masters for Shadyville Caribbean.
Shadyville Caribbean, an extension of DJ Whoo Kid’s international Shadyville DJ fraternity, promotes the integration of music from the region with music in mainstream markets is a As one of the world’s most recognized Soca music ambassadors, DJ Tony Tempo will bring his Soca mixes to expand the entertainment options offered by Shadyville Caribbean.
“This is a prime opportunity to share Soca music with a much wider audience around the world, while enticing new listeners to experience the hottest sounds and waist-whining riddims from the Caribbean,” said DJ Tony Tempo.
Long-time Soca music lovers and those newly interested in this musical genre can download fresh and exclusive mixes from DJ Tony Tempo on ShadyvilleCaribbean.com. Fans can also check out the events page for parties, carnivals and other Shadyville programs featuring DJ Tony Tempo. Shadyville Caribbean is a venture supported by G-Unit and Thisis50.
Contact: DJ Tony Tempo 404 429-5400 djtonytempo@gmail.com

item.title: Nominated for Best Mix for Soca Awards
item.description:
This is Tony Tempo's mix which is selected for thw Soca Awards happenning September 2nd in Brooklyn NY.
Please vote for him in 3 categories, Soca DJ of the year - Category 13 Best Mix of the Year - Category 36 Best Internet radio - (www.thefrontlineradio.com) - Category 38
Also, look out for Tony Tempo on the parkway for Labor Day in Brooklyn, NY. He will be playing for Red Warriors carnival band. Go to http://www.warriorscarnival.com to see n join.
Blessings

item.title: Tony Tempo Podcast - 51 Years of Trini Road March Tunes - Part 3 of 3 hours
item.description:
This show is part 3 of 3 hours of Trinidad & Tobago road march tunes from 1956 to 2007.
Enjoy, as we go up d road with this podcast.
